ComicInfo.Title: Pussy (A Good Thing!); Bad Spell; John Says Goodbye; The Dream and the Dreamer; Mike's Dreams; The Ship Dream; Nightmare Sublime; Hypnotic Eyes; Qualms in the Night; Hello There (Master of Puppets); Nacht Merre; Dreams of Paris?; Small Bits of Dreams; Love and Fear; Why Doesn't the Ice Melt?; The Dream Dream; The Perils of Counting Sheep in Your Sleep; Jesse's Dreams; Suspicion; So Why I Had That Stupid Dream?!

ComicInfo.Summary: Mary talks about an eerie dream she had about a college friend whom she hadn't seen for weeks.
